snippet: A number of devices on the market enable athletes, fitness buffs and couch potatoes to monitor their biometric data to track general health or athletic performance.
lead_paragraph: A number of devices on the market enable athletes, fitness buffs and couch potatoes to monitor their biometric data to track general health or athletic performance.

headline.seo: An Array of Devices to Track Health
headline.main: An Array of Devices to Track Health
